verses.roman:
avadhūta gosāñira eka bhṛtya prema-dhāma
mīnaketana rāmadāsa haya tāṅra nāma

synonyms: avadhūta—the mendicant; gosāñira—of Lord Nityānanda; eka—one; bhṛtya—servant; prema-dhāma—reservoir of love; mīnaketana—Mīnaketana; rāma-dāsa—Rāmadāsa; haya—is; tāṅra—his; nāma—name.
translation: Lord Nityānanda Prabhu had a servant named Śrī Mīnaketana Rāmadāsa, who was a reservoir of love.
